tasks.description:
**Role:** Senior Fullstack Developer

**Task:** Design and implement system architecture for sea-net-desktop-v2

**Tech Stack Decision:**
- **Recommended:** TypeScript + Tauri v2 (balanced: type safety + JS ecosystem)
- **Rust Option:** Faster but steep learning curve (not recommended without Rust experience)
- **Keyboard:** User lacks Rust experience ‚Üí TypeScript preferred for faster delivery

**Priority Mappings:**
- Priority 1 (MUST-HAVE): UX improvements - Keyboard shortcuts
- Priority 2: Productivity features
- Priority 3: Advanced features - May simplify or defer for v2 MVP

subtasks.title: Simplify Priority 3 features for v2 MVP

tasks.dod: Complete system architecture design with documentation and sprint breakdown
